cells.value: Reduce single use items, promote reuse, & expand recycling
cells.displayValue: Reduce single use items, promote reuse, & expand recycling

cells.value: When we use the term circular, we refer to our ability to keep materials in the economy in circulation and out of the environment. These solutions are focused on redesigning operations with circularity in mind through reducing the consumption of single-use plastics and other disposables, and expanding opportunities to reuse, recycle, and compost. An efficient circular system generates little to no waste.
cells.displayValue: When we use the term circular, we refer to our ability to keep materials in the economy in circulation and out of the environment. These solutions are focused on redesigning operations with circularity in mind through reducing the consumption of single-use plastics and other disposables, and expanding opportunities to reuse, recycle, and compost. An efficient circular system generates little to no waste.

cells.value: Divert products to be made into new materials instead of becoming waste.
cells.displayValue: Divert products to be made into new materials instead of becoming waste.

cells.value: Rather than sending all waste to the landfill, divert accepted materials for recycling. Recycling programs will differ by location and municipality.
cells.displayValue: Rather than sending all waste to the landfill, divert accepted materials for recycling. Recycling programs will differ by location and municipality.

cells.value: Yes, Hauler (can be client or Facilities driven)
cells.displayValue: Yes, Hauler (can be client or Facilities driven)

cells.value: Utilize a recycling solution for electronic waste, instead of sending it to the landfill. Electronics recycling will differ by location and municipality. Often it is a free service.
cells.displayValue: Utilize a recycling solution for electronic waste, instead of sending it to the landfill. Electronics recycling will differ by location and municipality. Often it is a free service.

cells.value: Utilize a recycling solution for printer ink cartridges, instead of sending them to the landfill. Our supplier partnership with HP provides this recycling solution to us at no cost.
cells.displayValue: Utilize a recycling solution for printer ink cartridges, instead of sending them to the landfill. Our supplier partnership with HP provides this recycling solution to us at no cost.

cells.value: Terracycle is a solution for difficult to recycle items that are not accepted in a traditional waste stream. There are several different "waste streams" you can choose from including candy and snack wrappers, gloves, and hotel amenties.
cells.displayValue: Terracycle is a solution for difficult to recycle items that are not accepted in a traditional waste stream. There are several different "waste streams" you can choose from including candy and snack wrappers, gloves, and hotel amenties.

cells.value: Terracycle is a solution for difficult to recycle items that are not accepted in a traditional waste stream.There are several different "waste streams" you can choose from including candy and snack wrappers, gloves, and hotel amenties.
cells.displayValue: Terracycle is a solution for difficult to recycle items that are not accepted in a traditional waste stream.There are several different "waste streams" you can choose from including candy and snack wrappers, gloves, and hotel amenties.

cells.value: Ensure that waste is managed correctly or support a better understanding of waste on site.
cells.displayValue: Ensure that waste is managed correctly or support a better understanding of waste on site.

cells.value: Label waste bins based on their destination (landfill, recycle, compost), to ensure that consumers are properly sorting their waste.
cells.displayValue: Label waste bins based on their destination (landfill, recycle, compost), to ensure that consumers are properly sorting their waste.

cells.value: Implement a twin waste bin system at every station with one for trash and one for recycling. To avoid confusion or contamination, it is important that trash and recycling bins are always available together vs. separated. Cost is dependent on the number of bins needed.
cells.displayValue: Implement a twin waste bin system at every station with one for trash and one for recycling. To avoid confusion or contamination, it is important that trash and recycling bins are always available together vs. separated. Cost is dependent on the number of bins needed.

cells.value: Waste system : Triple bins (landfill, recycle, compost)
cells.displayValue: Waste system : Triple bins (landfill, recycle, compost)

cells.value: Implement a triple waste bin system at every station - one for landfill, one for recycling, and one for compost. To avoid confusion or contamination, it is important that trash recycling and compost bins are always available together vs. separated. Cost is dependent on the number of bins needed.
cells.displayValue: Implement a triple waste bin system at every station - one for landfill, one for recycling, and one for compost. To avoid confusion or contamination, it is important that trash recycling and compost bins are always available together vs. separated. Cost is dependent on the number of bins needed.

cells.value: Oscar Sort is a front of house tech solution to educate consumers on proper waste sorting. It also includes post consumer data tracking.
cells.displayValue: Oscar Sort is a front of house tech solution to educate consumers on proper waste sorting. It also includes post consumer data tracking.

cells.value: Conduct a waste audit to analyze your waste stream and identify opportunities for waste reduction. Waste audits can be conducted by staff or a professional paid auditor.
cells.displayValue: Conduct a waste audit to analyze your waste stream and identify opportunities for waste reduction. Waste audits can be conducted by staff or a professional paid auditor.

cells.value: Yes, if hiring a professional auditor
cells.displayValue: Yes, if hiring a professional auditor

cells.value: Reduce the amount of packaging for service by offering items in bulk.
cells.displayValue: Reduce the amount of packaging for service by offering items in bulk.

cells.value: Provide bulk condiments utilizing dispensers in front of house instead of individual packets to cut down on single-use waste.
cells.displayValue: Provide bulk condiments utilizing dispensers in front of house instead of individual packets to cut down on single-use waste.

cells.value: Provide bulk sugar in breakrooms instead of individual packets.
cells.displayValue: Provide bulk sugar in breakrooms instead of individual packets.

cells.value: Utilize bulk products in convenience stores. We have several supplier partnerships for solutions but generally bulk products are in a refill display for customers to select the portion of the product they would like to purchase. In order to be a sustainable solution, you will need to consider the container you are selling the products in as well. Review options from the suggestions provided.
cells.displayValue: Utilize bulk products in convenience stores. We have several supplier partnerships for solutions but generally bulk products are in a refill display for customers to select the portion of the product they would like to purchase. In order to be a sustainable solution, you will need to consider the container you are selling the products in as well. Review options from the suggestions provided.

cells.value: Reduce or eliminate the amount of single-use plastics related to beverages.
cells.displayValue: Reduce or eliminate the amount of single-use plastics related to beverages.

cells.value: Only provide eco-friendly straws in operations. Eco-friendly versions include paper and compostable options made of PLA or PHA. Operations can also sell reusable straws made of durable ideally non-plastic materials.
cells.displayValue: Only provide eco-friendly straws in operations. Eco-friendly versions include paper and compostable options made of PLA or PHA. Operations can also sell reusable straws made of durable ideally non-plastic materials.

cells.value: Only provide eco-friendly straws, and only when a consumer requests one.
cells.displayValue: Only provide eco-friendly straws, and only when a consumer requests one.

cells.value: Use aluminum cups, which can be easily recycled or even reused by the customer, rather than plastic cups.
cells.displayValue: Use aluminum cups, which can be easily recycled or even reused by the customer, rather than plastic cups.

cells.value: Eliminate lids for cold beverages in service in order to reduce waste.
cells.displayValue: Eliminate lids for cold beverages in service in order to reduce waste.

cells.value: Customers can bring their own cup to receive a discount for hot and/or cold beverages.
cells.displayValue: Customers can bring their own cup to receive a discount for hot and/or cold beverages.

cells.value: Offer a reusable cup program where cups are provided on-site. In larger volume locations, these programs typically work best in a deposit return systemwhere a small fee is charged and returned after use so customers are incentivized to return their cups.
cells.displayValue: Offer a reusable cup program where cups are provided on-site. In larger volume locations, these programs typically work best in a deposit return systemwhere a small fee is charged and returned after use so customers are incentivized to return their cups.

cells.value: No plastic bottles : Aluminum and glass
cells.displayValue: No plastic bottles : Aluminum and glass

cells.value: Only offer beverages in aluminum or glass bottles and cans instead of plastic bottles.
cells.displayValue: Only offer beverages in aluminum or glass bottles and cans instead of plastic bottles.

cells.value: Provide a refill system instead of offering single-use plastic bottles.There are options for water, soda, and other various beverages that can be incorporated in operations.
cells.displayValue: Provide a refill system instead of offering single-use plastic bottles.There are options for water, soda, and other various beverages that can be incorporated in operations.

cells.value: Reduce or eliminate the amount of single-use plastics in a dining location.
cells.displayValue: Reduce or eliminate the amount of single-use plastics in a dining location.

cells.value: Use of durable small wares in operations rather than disposables.
cells.displayValue: Use of durable small wares in operations rather than disposables.

cells.value: Use single-serve napkin dispensers instead of individually wrapped napkins. To further reduce napkin use, place in central areas vs. on each individual table.
cells.displayValue: Use single-serve napkin dispensers instead of individually wrapped napkins. To further reduce napkin use, place in central areas vs. on each individual table.

cells.value: Use single-serve utensil dispensers instead of individually wrapped cutlery or cutlery kits.
cells.displayValue: Use single-serve utensil dispensers instead of individually wrapped cutlery or cutlery kits.

cells.value: Use single-serve paper towel dispensers instead of individually wrapped items.
cells.displayValue: Use single-serve paper towel dispensers instead of individually wrapped items.

cells.value: Mobile orders : Opt out of cutlery
cells.displayValue: Mobile orders : Opt out of cutlery

cells.value: Provide an option in your mobile ordering system prompting consumers with the choice to decline cutlery.
cells.displayValue: Provide an option in your mobile ordering system prompting consumers with the choice to decline cutlery.

cells.value: Yes, coordination with mobile ordering partners
cells.displayValue: Yes, coordination with mobile ordering partners

cells.value: Reduce or eliminate the amount of single-use plastics used in catering.
cells.displayValue: Reduce or eliminate the amount of single-use plastics used in catering.

cells.value: Design catering programs to be zero waste or only use disposable products with environmentally preferable specifications (compostable or recyclable).
cells.displayValue: Design catering programs to be zero waste or only use disposable products with environmentally preferable specifications (compostable or recyclable).

cells.value: Solutions that incorporate recycled content in products, meaning less virgin or new materials are used, which cuts emissions and supports a circular system.
cells.displayValue: Solutions that incorporate recycled content in products, meaning less virgin or new materials are used, which cuts emissions and supports a circular system.

cells.value: Provide napkins made from post-consumer content, which uses less material overall since it is made of recycled inputs.
cells.displayValue: Provide napkins made from post-consumer content, which uses less material overall since it is made of recycled inputs.

cells.value: Provide toilet paper made from post-consumer content, which uses less material overall since it is made of recycled inputs.
cells.displayValue: Provide toilet paper made from post-consumer content, which uses less material overall since it is made of recycled inputs.

cells.value: Provide paper towels made from post-consumer content, which uses less material overall since it is made of recycled inputs.
cells.displayValue: Provide paper towels made from post-consumer content, which uses less material overall since it is made of recycled inputs.

cells.value: Choose uniforms made from recycled content or certified organic cotton.
cells.displayValue: Choose uniforms made from recycled content or certified organic cotton.

cells.value: Reduce or eliminate single-use plastics in packaging.
cells.displayValue: Reduce or eliminate single-use plastics in packaging.

cells.value: Provide compostable packaging for to-go meals.
cells.displayValue: Provide compostable packaging for to-go meals.

cells.value: Offer compostable disposables in locations where dishwashing is not available, but front-of-house composting is.
cells.displayValue: Offer compostable disposables in locations where dishwashing is not available, but front-of-house composting is.

cells.value: Single use plastic : Elimination in service
cells.displayValue: Single use plastic : Elimination in service

cells.value: Eliminate single-use plastic in food service areas to cut down on packaging waste. This will involve inventorying disposables and products in the service location.
cells.displayValue: Eliminate single-use plastic in food service areas to cut down on packaging waste. This will involve inventorying disposables and products in the service location.

cells.value: Remove plastic to-go bags from the front-of-house operations. If to-go bags are necessary, they can be replaced with FSC paper, reusable, or compostable options.
cells.displayValue: Remove plastic to-go bags from the front-of-house operations. If to-go bags are necessary, they can be replaced with FSC paper, reusable, or compostable options.

cells.value: No plastic bags : FOH and BOH
cells.displayValue: No plastic bags : FOH and BOH

cells.value: Remove plastic bags from the front and back of house operations.
cells.displayValue: Remove plastic bags from the front and back of house operations.

cells.value: Eliminate the use of EPS (expanded polystyrene) in service.
cells.displayValue: Eliminate the use of EPS (expanded polystyrene) in service.

cells.value: Reusable containers replace disposables in operations. Aramark is partnered with OZZI, G.E.T, and Whirley-DrinkWorks on reusable container solutions. Recommend considering a tracking solution with these types of programs to understand usage and support reducing container loss. Further details provided in the "Learn More' resources.
cells.displayValue: Reusable containers replace disposables in operations. Aramark is partnered with OZZI, G.E.T, and Whirley-DrinkWorks on reusable container solutions. Recommend considering a tracking solution with these types of programs to understand usage and support reducing container loss. Further details provided in the "Learn More' resources.

cells.value: A full turnkey reusable container program where containers are washed at off-site warewashing facilities. This solution is only available in specific geographic areas.
cells.displayValue: A full turnkey reusable container program where containers are washed at off-site warewashing facilities. This solution is only available in specific geographic areas.

cells.value: Source to positively impact people, animals, & the environment
cells.displayValue: Source to positively impact people, animals, & the environment

cells.value: Aramark has a deep, long-standing commitment to global procurement practices that aim to positively impact people, animals, biodiversity, and the environment. Our Responsible Sourcing program along with additional solutions in this tool allow operators to take our commitments a step further.
cells.displayValue: Aramark has a deep, long-standing commitment to global procurement practices that aim to positively impact people, animals, biodiversity, and the environment. Our Responsible Sourcing program along with additional solutions in this tool allow operators to take our commitments a step further.

cells.value: Products and partnerships grown, raised, caught, or manufactured by an independently owned business within 250 miles (400 km) of the Aramark client’s location. *Note that we will accept a client’s definition of local if it differs.
cells.displayValue: Products and partnerships grown, raised, caught, or manufactured by an independently owned business within 250 miles (400 km) of the Aramark client’s location. *Note that we will accept a client’s definition of local if it differs.

cells.value: Host a farmer's market on-site to support local farmers and artisans.
cells.displayValue: Host a farmer's market on-site to support local farmers and artisans.

cells.value: Partner with local farmer(s) and/or distributors to offer a community-supported agriculture program to offer customers an opportunity to purchased fresh and local produce. CSAs can be offered in the late spring, summer, or fall and are dependent on crop availabilty.
cells.displayValue: Partner with local farmer(s) and/or distributors to offer a community-supported agriculture program to offer customers an opportunity to purchased fresh and local produce. CSAs can be offered in the late spring, summer, or fall and are dependent on crop availabilty.

cells.value: Utilize local restaurants or food trucks by having them come in for a rotation through Local Restaurant Row partnership.
cells.displayValue: Utilize local restaurants or food trucks by having them come in for a rotation through Local Restaurant Row partnership.

cells.value: Engage in programming with local farms and businesses to cultivate relationships for local sourcing.
cells.displayValue: Engage in programming with local farms and businesses to cultivate relationships for local sourcing.

cells.value: Approved solutions for growing food on site.
cells.displayValue: Approved solutions for growing food on site.

cells.value: Implement Babylon Micro Farms, which are hydroponic farms that allow the  user to grow their own leafy greens, herbs, micro-greens, and edible flowers inside on-site.
cells.displayValue: Implement Babylon Micro Farms, which are hydroponic farms that allow the  user to grow their own leafy greens, herbs, micro-greens, and edible flowers inside on-site.

cells.value: Build a garden on-site to source fresh produce. Please follow guidance in the "Learn More' section to ensure you are following appropriate Safety and Risk Control protocols.
cells.displayValue: Build a garden on-site to source fresh produce. Please follow guidance in the "Learn More' section to ensure you are following appropriate Safety and Risk Control protocols.

cells.value: Products that meet Aramark’s purchasing commitments for animal welfare, antibiotics stewardship, land conversion, no-deforestation and biodiversity, sustainable seafood, and embedding circularity. Also includes products that are third party certified such as USDA Organic or Fair Trade.
cells.displayValue: Products that meet Aramark’s purchasing commitments for animal welfare, antibiotics stewardship, land conversion, no-deforestation and biodiversity, sustainable seafood, and embedding circularity. Also includes products that are third party certified such as USDA Organic or Fair Trade.

cells.value: Use third party verified products to ensure responsible sourcing. (Fair Trade, Organic, Humanely raised, etc)
cells.displayValue: Use third party verified products to ensure responsible sourcing. (Fair Trade, Organic, Humanely raised, etc)

cells.value: Aramark is committed to purchase only cage-free eggs by 2020 in the U.S. and globally by 2025.
cells.displayValue: Aramark is committed to purchase only cage-free eggs by 2020 in the U.S. and globally by 2025.

cells.value: Aramark is committed to source 100% of contracted seafood from responsible sources by 2018.- by Enterprise guidelines.
cells.displayValue: Aramark is committed to source 100% of contracted seafood from responsible sources by 2018.- by Enterprise guidelines.

cells.value: Aramark is committed to phasing out the routine use of antibiotics for use as growth promoters or disease prevention across poultry, beef, pork and seafood categories in our supply chain.
cells.displayValue: Aramark is committed to phasing out the routine use of antibiotics for use as growth promoters or disease prevention across poultry, beef, pork and seafood categories in our supply chain.

cells.value: Aramark is committed to purchase only humanely-raised broiler chickens by 2024
cells.displayValue: Aramark is committed to purchase only humanely-raised broiler chickens by 2024

cells.value: Aramark is committed to purchasing contracted soy-based oils, specified margarines and shortenings, and beef products with no deforestation risk by 2025.
cells.displayValue: Aramark is committed to purchasing contracted soy-based oils, specified margarines and shortenings, and beef products with no deforestation risk by 2025.

cells.value: Aramark is committed to purchasing only 100% group-house pork
cells.displayValue: Aramark is committed to purchasing only 100% group-house pork

cells.value: Set non-dairy milk as the default option for consumers as a step to further reduce greenhouse gas emissions from food at your location.
cells.displayValue: Set non-dairy milk as the default option for consumers as a step to further reduce greenhouse gas emissions from food at your location.

cells.value: Menus designed to drive sustainability through vegan, plant forward, and/or Coolfood low carbon offerings.
cells.displayValue: Menus designed to drive sustainability through vegan, plant forward, and/or Coolfood low carbon offerings.

cells.value: Provide vegan options in grab-and-go areas.
cells.displayValue: Provide vegan options in grab-and-go areas.

cells.value: Provide a vegan dining guide for consumers.
cells.displayValue: Provide a vegan dining guide for consumers.

cells.value: Menu and label a variety of plant-forward options to reduce greenhouse gas emissions from food at your location.
cells.displayValue: Menu and label a variety of plant-forward options to reduce greenhouse gas emissions from food at your location.

cells.value: Have a dedicated vegan/vegetarian station in operation.
cells.displayValue: Have a dedicated vegan/vegetarian station in operation.

cells.value: Coolfood meals are meals certified by the World Resources Institute that meet both a carbon footprint and nutritional standard. Reach out to the Enterprise Sustainability Team to learn how you can implement Coolfood meals at your location (currently only available for Collegiate Hospitality, Healthcare+, and Workplace Hospitality LOBs).
cells.displayValue: Coolfood meals are meals certified by the World Resources Institute that meet both a carbon footprint and nutritional standard. Reach out to the Enterprise Sustainability Team to learn how you can implement Coolfood meals at your location (currently only available for Collegiate Hospitality, Healthcare+, and Workplace Hospitality LOBs).

cells.value: Design your menu based on the seasonal availability of produce.
cells.displayValue: Design your menu based on the seasonal availability of produce.

cells.value: Design a catering menu that heavily features local or third-party verified sustainable ingredients.
cells.displayValue: Design a catering menu that heavily features local or third-party verified sustainable ingredients.

cells.value: Develop a catering menu that is plant based. This is a way to provide a sustainable catering event that not only accommodates vegans but is also lower in carbon.
cells.displayValue: Develop a catering menu that is plant based. This is a way to provide a sustainable catering event that not only accommodates vegans but is also lower in carbon.

cells.value: Reduce, donate, and compost food waste
cells.displayValue: Reduce, donate, and compost food waste

cells.value: Minimizing food waste is a core commitment for Aramark’s Be Well. Do Well. ESG platform. Actions that can reduce food waste are focused on prevention, recovery, and recycling.
cells.displayValue: Minimizing food waste is a core commitment for Aramark’s Be Well. Do Well. ESG platform. Actions that can reduce food waste are focused on prevention, recovery, and recycling.

cells.value: There are instances where our operations have excess yet safe-to-eat food. Our food donation program provides this food to local hunger relief agencies in our clients’ communities. These donations provide food to people in need and keep prepared food out of landfills, reducing the environmental impact of food waste. To ensure food safety, locations must follow the Aramark Food Donation Program guidelines.
cells.displayValue: There are instances where our operations have excess yet safe-to-eat food. Our food donation program provides this food to local hunger relief agencies in our clients’ communities. These donations provide food to people in need and keep prepared food out of landfills, reducing the environmental impact of food waste. To ensure food safety, locations must follow the Aramark Food Donation Program guidelines.

cells.value: Donate excess food via a partnership with the Food Donation Connection (FDC). FDC is an Enterprise food donation program partner that matches donations to local recipients.
cells.displayValue: Donate excess food via a partnership with the Food Donation Connection (FDC). FDC is an Enterprise food donation program partner that matches donations to local recipients.

cells.value: Donate excess food to either local or on-campus locations or a food bank. Please ensure local partnerships are approved via the Food Donation program website.
cells.displayValue: Donate excess food to either local or on-campus locations or a food bank. Please ensure local partnerships are approved via the Food Donation program website.

cells.value: Donate excess food via a partnership with The Food Recovery Network (FRN). FRN is a Collegiate hospitality-specific food donation program where students support the donation process. Requires interested student group on campus.
cells.displayValue: Donate excess food via a partnership with The Food Recovery Network (FRN). FRN is a Collegiate hospitality-specific food donation program where students support the donation process. Requires interested student group on campus.

cells.value: Donate excess food via a partnership with Goodr. Goodr is a food donation program where food pickups can be scheduled weekly or on demand.Program fees pay for transportation to donation partners, donation materials, and tracking via the organization's app.
cells.displayValue: Donate excess food via a partnership with Goodr. Goodr is a food donation program where food pickups can be scheduled weekly or on demand.Program fees pay for transportation to donation partners, donation materials, and tracking via the organization's app.

cells.value: We aim to eliminate waste before it’s created, these solutions focus on preventing or reducing waste through operational actions and/or training.
cells.displayValue: We aim to eliminate waste before it’s created, these solutions focus on preventing or reducing waste through operational actions and/or training.

cells.value: Remove trays from dining programs. This enables both energy and water savings. It can also help prevent food waste in an AYCTE setting.
cells.displayValue: Remove trays from dining programs. This enables both energy and water savings. It can also help prevent food waste in an AYCTE setting.

cells.value: Aramark's Hospitality Enablement Program to support source reduction throughout the food production process from start to finish.
cells.displayValue: Aramark's Hospitality Enablement Program to support source reduction throughout the food production process from start to finish.

cells.value: Manually track and log pre-consumer waste (when/where/why) and enter the log into GMM.
cells.displayValue: Manually track and log pre-consumer waste (when/where/why) and enter the log into GMM.

cells.value: Track and target reduction of pre-consumer waste in ENABLE technology. Operators record prep, service, and storage waste. Culinary teams should then be targeting opportunities to reduce waste such as staff training on trimming or portioning.
cells.displayValue: Track and target reduction of pre-consumer waste in ENABLE technology. Operators record prep, service, and storage waste. Culinary teams should then be targeting opportunities to reduce waste such as staff training on trimming or portioning.

cells.value: Track and target reduction of pre-consumer waste with LeanPath technology. Additionally, some software includes the capability to photograph.
cells.displayValue: Track and target reduction of pre-consumer waste with LeanPath technology. Additionally, some software includes the capability to photograph.

cells.value: Track post-consumer waste and educate consumers with the LeanPath Spark scale and consumer-facing display.
cells.displayValue: Track post-consumer waste and educate consumers with the LeanPath Spark scale and consumer-facing display.

cells.value: While Aramark strives to make the best use of all food, there are still instances when leftover food is inedible or cannot be donated, these solutions support alternative methods to further divert waste from landfills.
cells.displayValue: While Aramark strives to make the best use of all food, there are still instances when leftover food is inedible or cannot be donated, these solutions support alternative methods to further divert waste from landfills.

cells.value: Compost food waste from back of house operations rather than sending it to the landfill through a contracted service. t
cells.displayValue: Compost food waste from back of house operations rather than sending it to the landfill through a contracted service. t

cells.value: Compost food waste from front and back of house operations rather than sending it to the landfill through a contracted service.
cells.displayValue: Compost food waste from front and back of house operations rather than sending it to the landfill through a contracted service.

cells.value: Invest in equipment that pulps food waste into smaller pieces, making it more ideal for composting processes and reducing its weight for hauling
cells.displayValue: Invest in equipment that pulps food waste into smaller pieces, making it more ideal for composting processes and reducing its weight for hauling

cells.value: Invest in ORCA equipment that digests food waste and produces an effluent that is then treated by wastewater treatment. This machine can be continuously be fed food waste to allow for real-time processing.
cells.displayValue: Invest in ORCA equipment that digests food waste and produces an effluent that is then treated by wastewater treatment. This machine can be continuously be fed food waste to allow for real-time processing.

cells.value: By operating efficiently, we decrease operational costs for the business and our clients and help achieve our planetary targets. We’ve identified key steps to conserve water, energy, and reduce fuel consumption.
cells.displayValue: By operating efficiently, we decrease operational costs for the business and our clients and help achieve our planetary targets. We’ve identified key steps to conserve water, energy, and reduce fuel consumption.

cells.value: Taking steps to manage our energy consumption through building improvements, equipment, and standard operating procedures help us reduce our carbon footprint and operational costs.
cells.displayValue: Taking steps to manage our energy consumption through building improvements, equipment, and standard operating procedures help us reduce our carbon footprint and operational costs.

cells.value: Third-party energy management program is deployed to monitor usage and identify opportunities for efificiences.
cells.displayValue: Third-party energy management program is deployed to monitor usage and identify opportunities for efificiences.

cells.value: High efficiency hand dryers in bathrooms
cells.displayValue: High efficiency hand dryers in bathrooms

cells.value: Purchase high efficiency Energy Star hand dryers when replacing old ones.
cells.displayValue: Purchase high efficiency Energy Star hand dryers when replacing old ones.

cells.value: Source renewable energy, whether from an offsite provider, through onsite installation, or purchasing renewable energy credits (RECs) to cut down on GHG emissions from energy use.
cells.displayValue: Source renewable energy, whether from an offsite provider, through onsite installation, or purchasing renewable energy credits (RECs) to cut down on GHG emissions from energy use.

cells.value: Purchase EnergyStar-rated appliances when replacing equipment, to maximize operating efficiency by decreasing energy and water usage as well as lowering site-based greenhouse gas emissions.
cells.displayValue: Purchase EnergyStar-rated appliances when replacing equipment, to maximize operating efficiency by decreasing energy and water usage as well as lowering site-based greenhouse gas emissions.

cells.value: Conduct an energy audit to assess the energy efficiency of your building.
cells.displayValue: Conduct an energy audit to assess the energy efficiency of your building.

cells.value: Water usage in the hospitality and food service industry is high with usage estimates upwards of 24 gallons per seat per day. With at least 40 states anticipating water shortages by 2024, the need to conserve water is critical. From equipment to aerators, these solution outline water efficient techniques that can be deployed in operations to reduce consumption and yield utility savings.
cells.displayValue: Water usage in the hospitality and food service industry is high with usage estimates upwards of 24 gallons per seat per day. With at least 40 states anticipating water shortages by 2024, the need to conserve water is critical. From equipment to aerators, these solution outline water efficient techniques that can be deployed in operations to reduce consumption and yield utility savings.

cells.value: Install faucet aerators on hand and prep sinks to limit water flow in order to conserve energy and waste.
cells.displayValue: Install faucet aerators on hand and prep sinks to limit water flow in order to conserve energy and waste.

cells.value: Purchase low flow faucets and sinks, or EPA WaterSense certified products when replacing equipment in order to maximize water usage efficiency.
cells.displayValue: Purchase low flow faucets and sinks, or EPA WaterSense certified products when replacing equipment in order to maximize water usage efficiency.

cells.value: Implement a rainwater capture system and use the grey water in your building.
cells.displayValue: Implement a rainwater capture system and use the grey water in your building.

cells.value: Use a Boss Defrost to mimic "slacking" (the running water method of defrosting) in order to reduce water use by 98.5%.
cells.displayValue: Use a Boss Defrost to mimic "slacking" (the running water method of defrosting) in order to reduce water use by 98.5%.

cells.value: Conduct a water audit to account for all of the water in a water system to understand uses and losses.
cells.displayValue: Conduct a water audit to account for all of the water in a water system to understand uses and losses.

cells.value: Lighting and heating/cooling are significant energy users. These enhancement and features can save energy, reduce maintenance costs, and yield utility savings.
cells.displayValue: Lighting and heating/cooling are significant energy users. These enhancement and features can save energy, reduce maintenance costs, and yield utility savings.

cells.value: Replace incandescent, halogen, or fluorescent bulbs with LEDs to maximize energy efficiency.
cells.displayValue: Replace incandescent, halogen, or fluorescent bulbs with LEDs to maximize energy efficiency.

cells.value: Switch to motion sensor lighting to reduce electricity consumption and site-based greenhouse gas emissions..
cells.displayValue: Switch to motion sensor lighting to reduce electricity consumption and site-based greenhouse gas emissions..

cells.value: Employ a lighting and temperature control system to maximize utility use efficiency.
cells.displayValue: Employ a lighting and temperature control system to maximize utility use efficiency.

cells.value: When it comes to conserving energy, energy monitoring and target setting can yield efficiency and cost savings.
cells.displayValue: When it comes to conserving energy, energy monitoring and target setting can yield efficiency and cost savings.

cells.value: Implement a dashboard on site that displays the utility metrics of your location.
cells.displayValue: Implement a dashboard on site that displays the utility metrics of your location.

cells.value: Monitor and track utilities use to identify trends and establish baselines to improve upon.
cells.displayValue: Monitor and track utilities use to identify trends and establish baselines to improve upon.

cells.value: Track greenhouse gas emissions and implement a reduction plan.
cells.displayValue: Track greenhouse gas emissions and implement a reduction plan.

cells.value: From signage and programming to incorporating standard operating procedures, operational efficiency supports conserving energy and water in our operations.
cells.displayValue: From signage and programming to incorporating standard operating procedures, operational efficiency supports conserving energy and water in our operations.

cells.value: Hang signage around the back of house to encourage the conservation of resources like water and electricity. Example signage locations could be by light switches or sinks.
cells.displayValue: Hang signage around the back of house to encourage the conservation of resources like water and electricity. Example signage locations could be by light switches or sinks.

cells.value: Use environmentally preferable products for cleaning.
cells.displayValue: Use environmentally preferable products for cleaning.

cells.value: Use chemical-free water-based products for cleaning.
cells.displayValue: Use chemical-free water-based products for cleaning.

cells.value: Education is an important tool in helping learners of all ages to develop the knowledge, skills, and agency to address interconnected global challenges including climate change, loss of biodiversity, unsustainable use of resources, etc. These solutions offer various methods to reach employees, consumers, and clients on the sustainability journey.
cells.displayValue: Education is an important tool in helping learners of all ages to develop the knowledge, skills, and agency to address interconnected global challenges including climate change, loss of biodiversity, unsustainable use of resources, etc. These solutions offer various methods to reach employees, consumers, and clients on the sustainability journey.

cells.value: Training helps to address the ‘what and why’ driving our sustainable strategies and targets. These training solutions introduce or deepen understanding of sustainability concepts and how to support incorporating these practices in operations.
cells.displayValue: Training helps to address the ‘what and why’ driving our sustainable strategies and targets. These training solutions introduce or deepen understanding of sustainability concepts and how to support incorporating these practices in operations.

cells.value: Make sustainability training mandatory for all new hires to ensure that all employees are aware of sustainability goals and practices.
cells.displayValue: Make sustainability training mandatory for all new hires to ensure that all employees are aware of sustainability goals and practices.

cells.value: Implement sustainability training during pre or post shift huddles.
cells.displayValue: Implement sustainability training during pre or post shift huddles.

cells.value: Host ongoing sustainability training through engagement sessions.
cells.displayValue: Host ongoing sustainability training through engagement sessions.

cells.value: Hire an on site sustainability staff person to support client and Enterprise sustainability priorities in operations.
cells.displayValue: Hire an on site sustainability staff person to support client and Enterprise sustainability priorities in operations.

cells.value: Sustainable events are solutions that engage our stakeholders to learn more about various sustainable topics and share Aramark’s progress against our planetary commitments.
cells.displayValue: Sustainable events are solutions that engage our stakeholders to learn more about various sustainable topics and share Aramark’s progress against our planetary commitments.

cells.value: Host sustainability themed educational events to encourage sustainability and inform consumers on site.
cells.displayValue: Host sustainability themed educational events to encourage sustainability and inform consumers on site.

cells.value: Host sustainability-themed meal(s) or feature limited-time sustainability menu offerings.
cells.displayValue: Host sustainability-themed meal(s) or feature limited-time sustainability menu offerings.

cells.value: Host a weigh the waste event by weighing all the waste collected from a day, in order to collect data on the location's waste output.
cells.displayValue: Host a weigh the waste event by weighing all the waste collected from a day, in order to collect data on the location's waste output.

cells.value: An important part of sustainability is telling our story, these tools support communication and storytelling on our specific initiatives.
cells.displayValue: An important part of sustainability is telling our story, these tools support communication and storytelling on our specific initiatives.

cells.value: Highlight sustainable practices that are being employed at your location on social media or on the location's website.
cells.displayValue: Highlight sustainable practices that are being employed at your location on social media or on the location's website.

cells.value: Implement Sip Smarter, Enterprise Sustainability's single-use plastic straw reduction strategy.
cells.displayValue: Implement Sip Smarter, Enterprise Sustainability's single-use plastic straw reduction strategy.

cells.value: Implement Choose to Reuse marketing campaign that highlights reusable options in the dining operations. Ex: BYO cup, utensils, napkins, bags, etc.
cells.displayValue: Implement Choose to Reuse marketing campaign that highlights reusable options in the dining operations. Ex: BYO cup, utensils, napkins, bags, etc.

cells.value: Implement signage to highlight local producers and businesses.
cells.displayValue: Implement signage to highlight local producers and businesses.

cells.value: Reporting is a key component of showing sustainability progress over time. These solutions demonstrate how reporting can be generated based off operational work in sustainability.
cells.displayValue: Reporting is a key component of showing sustainability progress over time. These solutions demonstrate how reporting can be generated based off operational work in sustainability.

cells.value: Highlight your sustainability metrics and programming at point of sale or in other places at your location.
cells.displayValue: Highlight your sustainability metrics and programming at point of sale or in other places at your location.

cells.value: Track your sustainable non-food purchases either by spend or by volume. Report to client on established cadence
cells.displayValue: Track your sustainable non-food purchases either by spend or by volume. Report to client on established cadence

cells.value: Track your sustainable food purchases either by spend or by volume. Report to client on established cadence.
cells.displayValue: Track your sustainable food purchases either by spend or by volume. Report to client on established cadence.

cells.value: Report and track your local purchases through the Aramark Local & Regional sourcing portal.
cells.displayValue: Report and track your local purchases through the Aramark Local & Regional sourcing portal.

cells.value: Certifications are a transparent way to demonstrate our commitment and progress to operating sustainably.
cells.displayValue: Certifications are a transparent way to demonstrate our commitment and progress to operating sustainably.

cells.value: Complete requirements to become a Fair Trade School. Fair Trade Campus designations are awarded to campuses that meet three specific requirements and they distinguish institutes as leaders in social justice.
cells.displayValue: Complete requirements to become a Fair Trade School. Fair Trade Campus designations are awarded to campuses that meet three specific requirements and they distinguish institutes as leaders in social justice.

cells.value: Support AASHE Sustainability, Tracking, Assessment & Rating System is a self-reporting framework for CH LOBs to measure their sustainability performance.
cells.displayValue: Support AASHE Sustainability, Tracking, Assessment & Rating System is a self-reporting framework for CH LOBs to measure their sustainability performance.

cells.value: Paid certification to sell MSC certified seafood.
cells.displayValue: Paid certification to sell MSC certified seafood.

cells.value: Achevie WELL certfication. WELL certifications recognize buildings designed and constructed to support the health and well-being of their occupants.
cells.displayValue: Achevie WELL certfication. WELL certifications recognize buildings designed and constructed to support the health and well-being of their occupants.

cells.value: In partnership with client, build to LEED standards. The U.S. Green Building Council offers LEED certifications for buildings that meet rigorous environmental requirements. There are four different levels of certification depending on the number of points awarded.
cells.displayValue: In partnership with client, build to LEED standards. The U.S. Green Building Council offers LEED certifications for buildings that meet rigorous environmental requirements. There are four different levels of certification depending on the number of points awarded.

cells.value: Certify a location as TRUE Zero Waste. TRUE certifications are offered to physical facilities and their operations. A TRUE project's goal is to divert all solid waste from the landfill, incineration, and the environment. Facilities achieve certification if they meet the seven minimum program requirements and attain at least 31 points on the TRUE application form.
cells.displayValue: Certify a location as TRUE Zero Waste. TRUE certifications are offered to physical facilities and their operations. A TRUE project's goal is to divert all solid waste from the landfill, incineration, and the environment. Facilities achieve certification if they meet the seven minimum program requirements and attain at least 31 points on the TRUE application form.

cells.value: Certify location(s) as a Green Restaurant through the Green Restaurant Association. This is a transparent way for an operation to demonstrate all the sustainable steps being taken.
cells.displayValue: Certify location(s) as a Green Restaurant through the Green Restaurant Association. This is a transparent way for an operation to demonstrate all the sustainable steps being taken.
